text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: The rain from May falls. Is it the dew or my tears? Go forth, cockatoo. Carry my name to the heavens above!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: History is written by the victors. And if I win… All that lies beneath the Heavens, will be mine! And then, my name, my way of life— It will be left for future generations to come!
—I ended up having to go on a business trip, at the behest of my senior. Since I wasn't in charge of any uma musume myself, I've ended up in this situation too often.
choice_data_list: I need to scout an uma musume soon…
I need to scout an uma musume soon…

text_block_list.text: Gratitude! It seems you will be the one going on the business trip this weekend. Your job on this trip is to assist in a festival, the Soma Nomaoi!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa
Chairman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Indeed! You should know that the URA supports any traditional festivities relating to uma musumes. This is a part of that.

text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Myself and Tracen Academy are willing to give full cooperation to them. Especially since a lot of our alumni participate in the "Soma Nomaoi"!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: This time, a student will be joining the event as well. Since one of the alumni was suddenly unable to make it, we discussed having one of our students take their place.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: She really wanted to take part in this event so she volunteered. She has gone ahead to help with preparations, so please meet her at the site.
choice_data_list: What kind of uma musume is she?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Her name is No Reason. 
She's like… well, to put it simply—

text_block_list.name: Akikawa and Tazuna
text_block_list.text: A "Warlord".

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Wahahaha! 
The lot of you, our battle will soon begin. Be on your guard and don't let it down!
— There she is.
There was only one uma musume who spoke like a warlord. The other participants were speaking normally. I was certain she's the only one who could match that characteristic.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: I have no reason not to be! And you must be the fellow collaborator from Tracen then. As a fellow supporter, I'm looking forward to working with you～!
choice_data_list: Likewise, I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Nya ha ha! I'm one day your senior when it comes to things relating to the festival. So leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: I heard they need someone to be in charge of recording the "Scramble for the Heavenly Banner". That's where… oh it's time. I'll explain it on the way to the site!

On that spacious field, there were many warriors in armor gathered. It looked as though it was a scene before they set off for battle. I was overwhelmed, it was a something you'd never see in the modern day.
choice_data_list: Whoa… this is like a battle!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Verily, it does look like one doesn't it! I too will be partaking in the scramble! I'm very excited!

text_block_list.name: Yellow Flag Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: There you are, No Reason. Our group's uma musume are gathering on the other side, so follow me.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Aye! Right, allow me to introduce you. This person here is the helper from Tracen. Trainer, she's an alumni from Tracen!
choice_data_list: I'm in charge of recording today.
I'm in charge of recording today.

text_block_list.name: Yellow Flag Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Thank you for helping! So you're going to be recording the "Scramble"? If that's the case, make sure not to just focus on the banners, but record the entirety of the battle! Ufu
choice_data_list: Record everything… got it, I'll do that.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Since I'm so charming, you might end up recording only me! Can you withstand my charms? Nya ha ha ha!

With clear skies, the conch shell's sound reverberated. 
The "Scramble for the Heavenly Banner" has begun.
The event involves a firework shell being launched into the sky with a payload of 2 banners inside. After the fireworks explode, the banners fall and the warriors scramble for them.
The participants were equiped with a pole, that is how they would take the banner. It had another use, a way to keep your opponents in check. It was without a doubt, a battle.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Ha～ ha ha! The honor of claiming the first banner is mine for the taking!
The first one to charge into the fray, was No Reason. She broke from the group in mere moments and headed straight to the exact spot where the banner was falling.

"She got it"— 
Is what I thought, but then…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Nuwaaaah!
No Reason fell and tumbled forward in a spectacular fashion. At that moment, another uma musume came from behind and leisurely picked up the banner.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Owie… Nuwaaaaah～! My banner～～!

text_block_list.name: Local Viewer A
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, you were too enthusiastic when charging in! 
Lil missy, you gotta use your head more if you want the flag!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: H-hey! I heard that! I'll show you… don't underestimate my ingenuity! I'll show you how it's done!
She was breathing heavily, but was raring to go, but—

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Oh, the wind is much stronger now. 
Taking that into account… it'll land towards the southwest!

text_block_list.name: Enemy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
If it'll land there, then I'm much closer! Here I go! 
Uoooooooh!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Wha- what the heck!?

text_block_list.name: Enemy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
We won't let you get any closer! 
Everyone! Prepare to stop her! That banner will be ours!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Very well, I shall be your… wai- hold on a second! 
Why are there so many of you!? You fiends!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Hah, Hah… grrr, why can't I get a single banner!!
Every time she'd call out the spot where the banner would fall, she'd get surrounded by other uma musumes, which allowed someone to take the banners with ease.

So far, she hasn't been able to get a single banner… 
And then the final firework was launched.

text_block_list.name: Enemy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, too bad for you! You can't get past us. This is where you meet your end!
Nuuuuu, I won't let it end like this!
text_block_list.name: No Reason

text_block_list.text: No Reason then lowered her stance and in one go, cut through the umas guarding her.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: If I can't even get a single banner, then I'll bring shame acting as the substitute!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Toryaaaaaa! That last banner… is mine!!!!

text_block_list.name: Yellow Flag Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yo, good job today! Man～, we did great today, didn't we? Look at them, they managed to get 3 banners.

text_block_list.name: Allied Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ehehe～, My first time participating and I managed to get 3 banners! I'm su～per happy!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, splendid work! 
You managed to achieve such feats whilst I was fighting on the frontline. How admirable!

text_block_list.name: Local Viewer A
text_block_list.text:
You were certainly something to behold, missy! 
Falling here and there and then getting surrounded. Gave me a good laugh!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Wha-, I wasn't trying to make you laugh though!? 
My last charge was cool, wasn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Local Viewer
text_block_list.text: Hmm… when you put it like that, nope. You falling was more memorable! Wahahaha!
While she had a habit of overdoing things, it just made it easier to get along with her. And so, No Reason had lively conversations with everyone.
